Html:
Hi,

I was wondering, is this package fully compatible with Umbraco 7? We have it installed, and it seems to work just fine, with one minor exception. Content that is inserted into a page from a partial view seems to be ignored. Is there a solution for this?

Kind regards,

-Ferdy

Hi Ferdy

Unfortunately FullTextSearch has not been tested for Umbraco 7 compatibility yet. I will add this to the to-do list but cannot say exactly when this will be available at this stage. Until then, feel free to have a look at the source if you prefer to see if you can solve this issue before then.

Regards,
Rigardt

Alrighty, I shall see if I have time to check this out. Thanks for the speedy reply!

-Ferdy

Hi Ferdy,

Any progress?
I am in need of a search function on my Umbraco 7.0.1 installation so I would be very grateful for any ideas on how to proceed.

Kind Regards
Fredrik

Hello,

With Umbraco 7.0.3 FullTextSearch is working fine. The content which is rendered through (nested) partial views is also found.

Regards,

John
